client.map.model

Class MapModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.map.model.MapModel

  • public class MapModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The Map Model stores all information about the map. This data includes information about hexes, edges, vertices, and the robber. Location data is stored in a X, Y grid format.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler

      • MapModel

        public MapModel()
        Creates a new Map Model object.

      • MapModel

        public MapModel(MapModel.Method method)
        This creates a new Map Model object. The method parameter allows a particular map style to be set up. This will eventually be located on the server.
        Parameters:
        method - The map style to set up.

      • GetEdge

        public Edge GetEdge(int x1,
                    int y1,
                    int x2,
                    int y2)
        Gets the edge associated with the two end points. The order of the points does not matter.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The first x coordinate.
        y1 - The first y coordinate.
        x2 - The second x coordinate.
        y2 - The second y coordinate.
        Returns:
        The associated edge.

        y - The y coordinate.
        Returns:

      • GetOccupiedVerticies

        public java.util.List<Vertex> GetOccupiedVerticies(Hex hex)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

                    int y)

        Parameters:
